summary: TAKATA RECALL.  "SERVICE AIRBAGS" MESSAGE KEEPS POPPING UP.  I AM CONCERNED FOR THE SAFETY OF MYSELF AND PASSENGERS.  THIS IS HAPPENING WHILE DRIVING, VEHICLE IN MOTION, IN DRIVE ON THE HIGHWAY AND BACK ROADS.  THE MESSAGE COMES ON AND GOES OFF SPORADICALLY FOR NO APPARENT REASON.  I CHECKED MY VIN# ON THE GM WEBSITE/RECALL LIST BUT MY PARTICULAR MAKE/MODEL/YEAR IS NOT ON THE RECALL LIST.  I HAVE CONCERN FOR THE SAFETY OF MYSELF AND PASSENGERS.  THE CAUSE IS UNKNOWN.  THE SERVICE AIRBAG MESSAGE HAS BEEN COMING ON FOR THE LAST 2 DAYS.
